about_the_game:
You wake up in a strange prison with one only goal in mind: find an escape from there. There are other people besides you, all linked by an inauspicious common fate: having committed the sin of eternal life.



Soul's Spectrum is a game where death is not just the end but an incentive to move forward: each time your soul is about to leave you instead it takes on a new form, allowing you to continue on your path. There're four possible stages that Nora, our protagonist, can have: the determined Human, the creaking Skeleton, the stealthy Umbra and the ethereal Anima. Will you be able to master your own skills to achieve your purpose?



GAME FEATURES:

  • Challenge yourself in this adventure where you will meet bizarre characters, explore a castle full of mysteries and avoid deadly traps!
  • Reveal through your actions and interactions a story full of unexpected twists and confessions, lasting about 3-4 hours.
  • Master the game's mechanics: death transforms you, allowing you to progressively assume as many as four distinct forms.
  • A series of puzzles and riddles wait to be solved, taking advantage of the unique abilities of Nora, the protagonist!
  • Be enchanted by the different scenarios in pixel art, with graphics nostalgically reminiscent of old RPG titles.
  • Lose yourself in this world by listening to the original 16-bit music tracks created by Javarnanda, changing according to the character's actual form!
